sentences.sContent: "It has very good range and is extremely popular with airlines because of its versatility, " he said.
sentences.sContent_eng: "It has very good range and is extremely popular with airlines because of its versatility, " he said.
sentences.sCn: “它有很好的服务范围并因其多功能性而受到航空公司的青睐，”他说。

synos.tran: 多功能性；多才多艺；用途广泛

remMethod.val: versa(转) + tility → 可以转动 → 多功能性

words.tran: 多才多艺的；通用的，万能的；多面手的
